de.tudarmstadt.ukp.lmf.transform

Class DBToXMLTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.lmf.transform.DBToXMLTransformer

  • public class DBToXMLTransformer
extends java.lang.Object
    Converts UBY-database to a XML file.
    Since:
    UBY 0.1.0
    Author:
    Yevgen Chebotar, Zijad Maksuti

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DBToXMLTransformer(DBConfig dbConfig, LMFWriter writer)
      Constructs a new DBToXMLTransformer instance which is used to convert UBY from a database to an XML file.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DBToXMLTransformer

        public DBToXMLTransformer(DBConfig dbConfig,
                  LMFWriter writer)
        Constructs a new DBToXMLTransformer instance which is used to convert UBY from a database to an XML file.
        Parameters:
        dbConfig - DBConfig instance used to access the database
        writer - LMFWriter used to write to a XML file
        Since:
        UBY 0.1.0

    • Method Detail

      • transform

        public void transform(LexicalResource lexicalResource)
               throws LMFWriterException
        Transforms a LexicalResource instance retrieved from a database to a XML file.
        Parameters:
        lexicalResource - the lexical resource retrived from the database
        Throws:
        LMFWriterException - if a severe error occurs when writing to a file
        Since:
        UBY 0.1.0

      • transformLexicons

        public void transformLexicons(LexicalResource lexialResource,
                     java.util.Set<java.lang.String> lexicons)
                       throws LMFWriterException
        Transforms a LexicalResource instance retrieved from a database to a XML file. The created XML only contains Lexicon instances which names are specified in the consumed Set. SenseAxis instances are omitted.
        Parameters:
        lexicalResource - the lexical resource retrieved from the database
        lexicons - the set of names of lexicons which should be written to XML file
        Throws:
        LMFWriterException - if a severe error occurs when writing to a file
        Since:
        UBY 0.2.0
        See Also:
        transform(LexicalResource), transformSenseAxes(LexicalResource)

      • transformSenseAxes

        public void transformSenseAxes(LexicalResource lexialResource)
                        throws LMFWriterException
        Transforms a LexicalResource instance retrieved from a database to a XML file. The created XML only contains SenseAxis contained in the consumed lexical resource.
        Parameters:
        lexicalResource - the lexical resource retrieved from the database
        Throws:
        LMFWriterException - if a severe error occurs when writing to a file
        Since:
        UBY 0.2.0
        See Also:
        transform(LexicalResource), #transformLexicons(LexicalResource, List)
